mapper.select: SELECT ur.user_id FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON r.id = rp.role_id WHERE rp.permission_id = #{permId} AND r.status = 1
SELECT DISTINCT ur.user_id FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON r.id = rm.menu_id WHERE rm.menu_id = #{menuId}
